title: Prohibition of discrimination
context: ยง612-2 Prohibition of discrimination. A citizen shall not be excluded from jury service in this State on account of race, color, religion, sex, national origin, economic status, or physical disability, except as provided in section 612-4(b)(1). [L 1973, c 191, pt of ยง1; am L 1976, c 159, ยง9; am L 2007, c 122, ยง1]
